name: n8n-nodes-nasapics
description: n8n node to call NASA's APOD and Mars Rover Photo services.

scripts.lint: tslint -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && eslint nodes credentials package.json
scripts.lintfix: tslint --fix -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && eslint nodes credentials package.json --fix
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint -c .eslintrc.prepublish.js nodes credentials package.json
